overview: The Interrogation is a video constructed entirely from still film photography and photo shop collage – playing out as a photomontage along with a voiceover. The work is two narratives intertwined. One comes from an audio recording of the artist interviewing a local officer from the Commission for Discipline Inspection. The other narrative is a short story written by the artist and inspired by Ingmar Bergman’s movie Persona (1966).
title: The Interrogation
